document.description: ... 6 and go up to $15 depending on what you order ... My wine is 5 days out of date - should I drink it? When was the last time you ate at a fast food restaurant?

What are you looking for? Advanced Search Home > All Categories > Dining Out > Other - Dining Out > Resolved Question SunnyDel... Member since: June 21, 2007 Total points: 4,259 (Level 4) Add Contact Block
Resolved Question Show me another » Drinks from Applebees? How much are drinks at Applebees? (I know these can vary by location, I'm asking for an approximate)
What is the best drink (alcoholic) that you've had from there?
I'm not a big drinker, but am going out to dinner with some friends, for some drinks too and want to know some good options. :D 4 years ago Report Abuse by SBoo Member since: September 06, 2007 Total points: 4,340 (Level 4) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker They usually range from $5-8.
At the Applebees near my house, they always have $2 Long Island Teas, a great deal, they're loaded with alcohol! 4 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Thank you. :D Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo! Add to Del.icio.us RSS
There are currently no comments for this question.
* You must be logged into Answers to add comments. Sign in or Register .
Other Answers (8) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by mexi_fry... Member since: May 09, 2008 Total points: 9,589 (Level 5) Add Contact Block I like the Main Street'Ritas® This Sauza Gold favorite is available on the rocks or frozen in strawberry, mango, or wildberry flavors. Main Street'Rita® Swirls A twist on our classic Sauza'Rita, These signature Swirls with Sauza Gold come in strawberry-mango or wildberry-mango flavors.
I get the frozen strawberry mango swirl. Its really good. The website has a pic of it too! Source(s): http://www.applebees.com/Menu_Drinks.asp… 4 years ago Report Abuse by Vanessa Member since: October 09, 2008 Total points: 140 (Level 1) Add Contact Block their margaritas or their cream fruit tequila drinks r the absolute best those r usually $4.50-5.20$ Source(s): Me Myself and I 4 years ago Report Abuse by v1ralyn Member since: March 06, 2007 Total points: 614 (Level 2) Add Contact Block I would say 5-10$
my favorite was the caramel apple martini and I think it was a frozen blackberry mango swirl margarita. 4 years ago Report Abuse by MikaB Member since: March 15, 2007 Total points: 9,199 (Level 5) Add Contact Block Drinks can start at $6 and go up to $15 depending on what you order and if it is considered top shelf. 4 years ago Report Abuse by mackenzi... Member since: January 05, 2009 Total points: 230 (Level 1) Add Contact Block $11.98 4 years ago Report Abuse by idk Member since: December 13, 2008 Total points: 2,225 (Level 3) Add Contact Block long island ice tea like 8 bucks 4 years ago Report Abuse by tucker_f... Member since: December 18, 2008 Total points: 1,581 (Level 3) Add Contact Block go to http://applebees.com 4 years ago Report Abuse
by Antwona Member since: August 06, 2008 Total points: 1,181 (Level 3) Add Contact Block
Answer hidden due to its low rating dunno don't live in the U.S 4 years ago Report Abuse
